answer: Geronimo O. - 7 months ago
customer: Hi Geronimo, All storage are not exact in stated capacity. All electronic storage has hidden partitions for its functions tools. All these hidden partitions will not be shown in Windows explorer, and Disk Management does not give an option to browse contents of these partitions. Also, the binary measurements are not exact for its stated capacity. You may research for it for more info. Thank you :)

question: 32gb. pero 29gb lang talaga
answer: Rickjun A. - 1 month ago
customer: Hi Rickjun, All storage are not exact in stated capacity. All electronic storage has hidden partitions for its functions tools. Also, the binary measurements are not exact for its stated capacity. You may research for it for more info. Thank you :) -jen

question: ano po yung nakalagay na 2500 watts na power consumption sa likod? mas mataas pa kain ng kuryente sa plantsa
answer:

question: ano po pinagka iba nito sa may ciss ?
answer: CIS - Most low-cost consumer printers place small ink tanks directly on the carriage with the printheads. These tanks can have extremely small liquid volumes, as low as 10 mL, and consequently require frequent replacement. It should be also noted that every cartridge replacement is usually automatically followed by head-cleaning cycle of the printer to remove air bubbles from system, further reducing usable ink amount. More expensive, business-grade printers use progressively larger ink tanks on the printhead, but as the platen width and speed of the printer increases it eventually becomes impractical to have the tanks integrated with the printheads due to the high mass and inertia the liquid volume adds to the printheads and the reduced accuracy of printing that occurs.

question: pwede po ba ito sa mp3?
answer:
Dear customer , if your device is the mp3 ,If your device's input current is lower than 60mA, 
this powerbank cannot charge your device. If your device's input current is higher than 60mA, this powerbank can charge your device, however it can't be full charge your device, because the process of charging is a curve process, once the input current of the device lower than 60mA during the charging process. 
the charge will be interrupted, so it will not full charge your device. Thank you for your understanding.
